author: ate
msg: Disabling the multi-threaded event delivery as its implementation is too simplistic and fundamentally unreliable and beyond the intended scope and purpose of the Pluto Portal Driver.
Replace it with a plain in-process event delivery solution by copying the logic from the PortletWindowThread.run() method inline in the EventProcessingServiceImpl.
